+    </hint>
+   </hints>
+  </connection>
+ </connections>
+</ui>

commit.message: Switched to older QT API calls to that paper wallet printing is compatible with Qt 4.6.4.

When printing paper wallets, add a warning message about security if connected to any peers.
Regenerate addresses at the end of the loop so that the shown wallet is the first to print.
Elaborating on the message after paper wallets are printed about ensuring print quality.

Conflicts:
	src/qt/utilitydialog.cpp

files.patch:
@@ -180,7 +180,7 @@
     </rect>
    </property>
    <property name="text">
-    <string>How Many Wallets?</string>
+    <string>How Many?</string>
    </property>
   </widget>
   <widget class="QComboBox" name="walletCount">
